page.title: 04District Council Offices
page.content: Durstons House stands on the main { {A30}road and was for many years the office of the Chard Borough Council. In 1974 when{Yeovil District Council was formed by the amalgamation of Chard and Yeovil Boroughs,the Urban Districts of Crewkerne and Illminster and the Rural Districts of Chard, Yeovil,Langport and Wincanton,it became an Area office of {Y.D.C.} Because of feeling in the outer area of the{Y.D.C.}that Yeovil was totally dominating the former communities,the name was changed in {1985}to{South {Somerset District Council. The office in Chard houses departments concerned with local rating, housing, Environmental Health, building regulations and is a paying in point for rent and rates.
